Contact

Hi! I’m a co-organizer of R-Ladies São Paulo since 2018, and I have taught in several meetups and workshops. All the slides are available here: beamilz.com/talks/. I’m also a co-organizer of satRday São Paulo and LatinR.

tidyverse certified trainer by RStudio.
